column4: so, ealier today, I removed everything "gnome..". and then I couldn't boot to my desktop. and enstead, I had to just use the text ubuntu mode or w/e it's called. and I reinstalled my desktop through there. and now when my comp restarted, I'm in the 640/800 or w/e it is. and I can't find my screen resolution settings. can someone please help
